actions.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 290 (Roll no. 398).

description: Amendment sought to reduce funding in all military construction accounts and the NATO Security Investment Program by 5 percent. Funds for military housing and the Base Closure Commission would not have been affected.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funding in all military construction accounts and the NATO Security Investment Program by 5%, producing a savings by $148 million. Funds for military housing and the base closure program would remain unaffected.
